Params: {3: 'The dull beating of a heart echoes in the dark abyss, profound and lingering.'}
{3: 'The lone lost soul has found the way home.'}
{3: 'As if a drowning exile reaching air at last, the cold, sticky heaviness—reminiscent of a soaked cotton coat—is gently peeled away from consciousness by a soft breeze...'}
{3: 'Your body seems to have endured tremendous suffering—a suffocating sensation rises from the nasal cavity, while a heart-wrenching, bone-piercing pain seeps through every joint—'}
{3: 'The world spins wildly as excessively bright light stabs at your eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: '【kuroname】... Are you alright? Feeling the effects of your injury?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Your consciousness feels like it's been salvaged from a cold, deep sea, carrying with it chilling tremors and biting sorrow."}
{3: 'Hazy fragments rise and fall in your mind. It feels like countless painful experiences were endured, yet also as if they were merely an all-too-real nightmare.'}
{3: 'As the ringing in your ears persists, black spots fade from retinas, revealing a concerned-looking Hassen before you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Thank you for your hard work on the last mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You mentioned in your report that Lithos has some unique insights on the Red Tide?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sorrow follows from the shadows. It feels... as if something has been forgotten...'}
{3: 'Your body acts before your mind can catch up, ignoring the ongoing meeting. You push open the doors and sprint desperately toward the Gray Raven lounge.'}
{3: 'It has to be now, it has to be at this exact time, you have to confirm it—'}
{3: 'A summer breeze caresses your cheek, bringing with it a disorienting sense of unreality.'}
{3: 'What exactly... have you forgotten? And what exactly are you trying to confirm?'}
{3: 'In your mind, a persistent voice keeps urging—Gray Raven lounge, you must get to the Gray Raven lounge—'}
{3: 'The despair from the nightmare still pursues you. If only, if only you can reach that place—'}
{3: 'The door to the Gray Raven lounge remains closed, as always.'}
{3: 'Your fingers quiver subtly, teeth chattering involuntarily, as if gripped by fear—fear of something irreparable—'}
{3: "Before there's time to think further, your body already begins executing the urgent command—"}
{3: 'Morning light flows through the room, boldly spilling into your field of vision.'}
{3: 'A warm hand, faster than the pursuing nightmare, reaches your shoulder.'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They say you were in the middle of giving a report when you suddenly fainted. As soon as you regained consciousness, you bolted out of the meeting room and ran straight to the lounge.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "After receiving Hassen's message, Lee rushed back even though he was only halfway through his frame calibration..."}
{3: 'The chill is brazenly washed away by the morning light, as sunshine strikes against darkness, mocking the abyss for its impotence.'}
{3: 'By your ear, the crackling of a bonfire and sounds of crying gradually fade away, replaced by the anxious conversation of Gray Raven.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant... Commandant! Vital signs appear normal. Liv, run a thorough examination!'}
{3: 'Your gaze loses focus, scattering amidst the warm light filling the room.'}
{1: "The heroes' feats lie buried beneath the first ray of dawn.", 3: '50'}
{3: "The heroes' feats lie buried beneath the first ray of dawn."}
{1: 'No one will remember the devastating price they have paid for this moment. No one will remember the pain and suffering they have endured for this "miracle".', 3: '45'}
{3: 'No one will remember the devastating price they have paid for this moment. No one will remember the pain and suffering they have endured for this "miracle".'}
{1: 'But... dawn has broken, the light has come.', 3: '50', 6: '1'}
{3: 'But... dawn has broken, the light has come.'}
{1: 'I shall traverse myriad sufferings and the darkest of nights, to meet with you—', 3: '50'}
{3: 'I shall traverse myriad sufferings and the darkest of nights, to meet with you—'}
{1: 'At the break of dawn, upon the first ray of light.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'At the break of dawn, upon the first ray of light.'}
{1: "The heroes' feats lie buried beneath the first ray of dawn.", 3: '50'}
{3: "The heroes' feats lie buried beneath the first ray of dawn."}
{1: 'No one will remember the devastating price they have paid for this moment. No one will remember the pain and suffering they have endured for this "miracle".', 3: '45'}
{3: 'No one will remember the devastating price they have paid for this moment. No one will remember the pain and suffering they have endured for this "miracle".'}
{1: 'But... dawn has broken, the light has come.', 3: '50', 6: '1'}
{3: 'But... dawn has broken, the light has come.'}
{1: 'I shall traverse myriad sufferings and the darkest of nights, to meet with you all—', 3: '50', 6: '1'}
{3: 'I shall traverse myriad sufferings and the darkest of nights, to meet with you all—'}
{1: 'At the break of dawn, upon the first ray of light.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'At the break of dawn, upon the first ray of light.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Control Court Officer A', 3: 'Something seems off with the Gray Raven Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Control Court Officer B', 3: "Is it about the meeting this morning? I've heard about it too, but I'm not sure what exactly happened...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Control Court Officer A', 3: 'I heard it might be Mind Beacon disruption during the last mission?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Control Court Officer B', 3: 'But it was supposed to be just a routine mission...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Control Court Officer B', 3: 'Oh... Ishmael? Back from your mission?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The pink-haired woman halts in her tracks as her colleague catches a glimpse of her from the side and greets her with enthusiasm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Ah... yes, I was on quite a long mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "But it's over now, and fortunately, the outcome was still what I had hoped for...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Control Court Officer B', 3: 'Well, all good if it went smoothly!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Control Court Officer B', 3: "It's lunchtime now, want to join us?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The pink-haired woman smiles in agreement with her colleague and walks slowly into the crowd.'}

{3: "<phonetic=Cradle>Agent Zero</phonetic>, killed by Chaos, has vanished into the crevices between past and future. All traces of Vonnegut's entry into this world have also been completely erased by Chaos."}
{3: 'Before this civilization reaches a sufficient level of advancement, the Hetero Tower will not descend in haste again.'}
{3: 'Time and causality have been converged piece by piece, forging the final and only path to the "future" for this civilization.'}
{3: 'Though she has paid a great price for it, she is willing to stand here and witness the "future" of this civilization.'}
{1: 'Everything is now as you wished, Gray Raven.', 3: '50', 6: '1'}
{3: 'Everything is now as you wished, Gray Raven.'}
{1: 'So this time... what choice will humanity make?', 3: '50', 6: '1'}
{3: 'So this time... what choice will humanity make?'}
